name: GKBehavior
desc: A set of goals that together influence the movement of an agent.

items.name: init(goal: GKGoal, weight: Float)
items.desc: Creates a behavior with a single goal.

items.name: init(goals: [GKGoal])
items.desc: Creates a behavior with the specified goals.

items.name: init(goals: [GKGoal], andWeights: [NSNumber])
items.desc: Creates a behavior with the specified goals and weights.

items.name: init(weightedGoals: [GKGoal : NSNumber])
items.desc: Creates a behavior with the specified mapping of goals to their weights.

items.name: func setWeight(Float, for: GKGoal)
items.desc: Sets the weight for the specified goal’s influence on agents, adding that goal to the behavior if not already present.

items.name: func weight(for: GKGoal) -> Float
items.desc: Returns the weight for the specified goal’s influence on agents.

items.name: func remove(GKGoal)
items.desc: Removes the specified goal from the behavior.

items.name: func removeAllGoals()
items.desc: Removes all goals from the behavior.

items.name: var goalCount: Int
items.desc: The number of goals in the behavior.

items.name: subscript(GKGoal) -> NSNumber!
items.desc: Returns the weight associated with the goal specified by subscript syntax.

items.name: subscript(Int) -> GKGoal
items.desc: Returns the goal at the specified index in the behavior’s list of goals.
